name: splitsecnd
0:
”Alexa, ask splitsecnd for a status report”
”Alexa, ask splitsecnd where is Jake”
”Alexa, ask splitsecnd if it is safe to contact David”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: split second
Developer Terms of Use
des: Working alongside your splitsecnd devices, this Skill can give you a status report for all of your devices, find the location of a specific driver, and check to see whether it's safe to contact a driver who might be on the road. For more information, go to splitsecnd.com
